_prev_prog_3.Description: El Dorado Refining Company has addressed the provisions of Process Safety Management and Risk Management and considers these to be very important in preventing and/or mitigating incidents or catstrophic releases.  More specific details are included in the executive summary.

El Dorado Refining Company has addressed the provisions of Process Safety Management and Risk Management and considers these to be very important in preventing and/or mitigating incidents or catstrophic releases.  More specific details are included in the executive summary.  The HF Alky Unit includes hydrocarbon detectors, HF acid detectors and video camera monitors for release detection.  For potential release containment and control, the unit has a perimeter water spray curtain, waterspray systems at pump seals, remotely activated shutoff valves for selected equipment and an HF acid de-inventory vessel.

The Water Treater Chlorine Injection system includes special metering equipment that stops chlorine flow when a leak or break in piping occurs.
